nodes.text: Lucy Autrey Wilson was the Director of Publishing for Lucasfilm. She initially came up with the idea of a multi-book story arc going beyond a trilogy, an idea which eventually was used in The New Jedi Order series.[source?]

Prince Xizor's name was created by Wilson, who combined the Portuguese pronunciation of the letter X (sh-) with the second syllable of the English word "razor." Xizor's official pronunciation was established in the Shadows of the Empire novel and Star Wars: Empire at War: Forces of Corruption as "shē'zōr".
The appearance of the character Mahd Windcaller in Crimson Empire II: Council of Blood was based on Wilson.
